name: Cake for a youth going on a journey alone - Berry
description: @Sugartivi | Dear art collector, every journey is ultimately a journey into the self. This cake is made of layers of poured jelly and blancmange. With each layer as half transparent, half opaque, an effect is created of an inner “staircase” going into the core. This flavorway was created for my eldest child and his journey: blueberry, raspberry and blackberry. Have it for your journey as well.
